downloadTitle: What's New in Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 Feature Pack for Retail
downloadDescription: This document describes new features and feature enhancements in the Retail module in Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 Feature Pack.

detailsSection: This document describes new features and feature enhancements in the Retail module in Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 Feature Pack.

systemRequirementsSection:

1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file format.
